Article.Title: Twitter’s Former Head Of Product Daniel Graf Has Left The Company
Article.Content: Daniel Graf, who was just recently bumped from his role as the head of Twitter’s product team, has parted ways with the company altogether. News of his departure comes by way of a tweet from Graf: Danke team, danke @Twitter! May you succeed in your mission, society needs you! — Daniel Graf (@danielgraf) December 5, 2014 Graf previously led the Maps team at Google, switching ships to Twitter just seven months ago. In October (just six months after Graf joined), CEO Dick Costolo opted to shift Graf’s role as product head to Kevin Weil.
